title: c'mon riot, fix the azir soldiers already.
body:
So I was watching NA LCS today, and Bischu's soldiers kept moving while they were idle.
I believe that this bug has been there forever; it annoyed me because I couldn't determine if Azir was actually attacking stuff or not.
Fix it riot, please.

replies.body: We've got a fix for that issue confirmed, unfortunately it just missed the cutoff for the patch that just went out (5.10). We're currently figuring out whether there's an appropriate hotfix to include it in, or whether to put it out in patch 5.11.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=rXk6E2NF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-30T21:51:01.044+0000)
>
> We've got a fix for that issue confirmed, unfortunately it just missed the cutoff for the patch that just went out (5.10). We're currently figuring out whether there's an appropriate hotfix to include it in, or whether to put it out in patch 5.11.

Yeah it's kinda a big deal in solo queue..I'd hazard sooner than later..since you think you're cs'ing but you're not..
Azir is just full of bugs isnt he?

Of course. Bugs are after all a bird's main diet.

Unless you're a bird of prey, which azir is obviously not.
A hotfix would be so nice

That's a shame it didn't make it to patch 5.10. Thanks for having the time to come in and tell us about it. :) Take your time, I was just frustrated because it was there forever and Riot didn't seem to notice it yet. Thanks again and have a great day!

taric pls thx who needs a third gankplank rework ? mf visuals is fine but another gankplank ? ... its like sejuanis rework shortly after her release... i know when taric is estimated to be released but i dont care i want him now.

They want to release Taric's rework with his VU & his VU isn't ready yet.It's what's holding up the update.Last I heard,Riot was about 90% done in determining what they want to do with Taric gameplay-wise.

And no,they can't pull a Ryze.Why?Because it's likely his new kit will require new animations & effects.I mean,imagine old Sion with new Sion's kit,would that even make sense?
i know im the guy who got the info out of riot repertoir in the first place but thats not enough for me to get rid of my obsession with taric.

Nice to know you guys have the solution c:

Considering it doesn't affect Azir's game play *too* much, I'd be fine with waiting till 5.11 personally. Keep up the good work guys!
